articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Chilean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Chilean President
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Sebastian Pinera Echenique, president of Chile, on the occasion of the bicentenary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, Kim in the message wished the president greater success in his work for prosperity of the country and improvement of the people's well-being.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Chilean FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Chilean FM
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Saturday sent a message of greetings to Alfredo Moreno Charme, foreign minister of Chile, on the occasion of the 200th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the relations between the two countries would steadily expand and develop in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, the message wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: UK Women's Football Team Here
articles.content:
UK Women's Football Team Here
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- A women's football team of Middlesbrough City of UK arrived here Saturday to have friendly matches on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the opening of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and UK.
					 Meanwhile, Prof. Susan Shirk, director of the Institute on Global Conflict and Cooperation of University of California, the United States, and her party arrived here on same day.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Performs in Sariwon
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Performs in Sariwon
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus gave performances at the North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theater from Sept. 15 to 17.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as male chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Il", orchestra and male chorus "Forest Is Swaying", male choruses "Push Back the Frontiers of the Latest Science and Technology", "Road of Victory" and "Fortune of Korea".
					
					The performers truthfully represented the firm faith and will of the army and the people of the DPRK to devotedly defend General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the destiny and future of the country and the nation, and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the Songun leadership of the Party.
					
					 Appreciating the performance were officials, people from all walks of life and youth and students in the province.

articles.title: Women's Football Workshop Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Women's Football Workshop Held in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- A FIFA women's football technical course took place at
					 Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang from September 13 to 17.
					 The workshop, which was held, divided into theoretical and practical courses, was participated in by women's football coaches of local sports teams.
					
					 It dealt with a program for women's football development, coaches' tactics in matches, methods for players' physical and technical improvement, etc.
					
					 It was given by Linton Victoria Anne, a FIFA lecturer.

articles.title: Posters Released on WPK Birthday
articles.content:
Posters Released on WPK Birthday
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Posters were produced by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House to mark the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 The poster which carries the symbol of the WPK and the slogan "Long live the glorious WPK!" depicts a working man entering the venue of the great festival, proud of having brought about an innovation in production and construction.
					
					 The other poster which bears letters "1945-2010", "Celebrations" and the "65th Anniversary" portrays the flag of the WPK and the Party Founding Memorial Tower against the backdrop of a nocturnal sky above the square, the venue of the October festival, brightly lit with gorgeous fireworks.

articles.title: US Blockade Termed Levers for Realizing World Domination
articles.content:
US Blockade Termed Levers for Realizing World Domination
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. describes sanctions and blockade as unavoidable "punitive" measures against "problematic countries" allegedly to ensure global "peace and security" and "democracy" and guarantee "human rights". But this is nothing but sheer sophism to cover up its sinister intention.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has enforced the policy of sanctions and blockade to isolate and suffocate the progressive countries and realize its wild ambition for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. adopted sanctions and blockade as an important lever to stifle the countries which incur its displeasure and a means for maintaining and strengthening its "leadership" position in the capitalist world.
					
					 The ultimate aim of the U.S. sanctions and blockade against other countries is to bring down the social system in the above-said countries and establish an American-style governing order there.
					
					 U.S. sanctions and blockade are very dangerous criminal acts as they are accompanied by wars. This is evidenced by the fact that the U.S. had long slapped sanctions against Iraq and finally put it under its control through armed invasion.
					
					 It is applying the same method to other countries in an effort to realize its hegemonic ambition with ease. 
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the U.S. is mulling applying the same method to the DPRK. Through sanctions and blockades the U.S. seeks to isolate and weaken the DPRK and thus disable it in an effort to control it with ease. Precisely for this reason the U.S. is escalating the sanctions and blockade against the DPRK. No one can vouch that the above-said sanctions and blockade will not develop into a war of aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: War Exercise for "Stabilizing North" Blasted
articles.content:
War Exercise for "Stabilizing North" Blasted
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The war exercise for "stabilizing the north" staged by the south Korean puppet military with the U.S. in August fully disclosed its inveterate wild ambition to invade the north as it was a reckless political and military provocation intended to bring down the dignified system in the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the south Korean Ministry of Unification was directly involved in the exercise. This indicates that the south Korean conservative authorities are pursuing a criminal aim to harm the DPRK by force of arms with the U.S., still dreaming of "a contingency in the north," not seeking reconciliation between the north and the south and peace of the country, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities had already worked out a variety of scenarios for bringing down the system in the north including an "emergency ruling plan" and the like and staged such charade as drafting what they called "unification constitution" the keynote of which is to achieve "unification under liberal democracy." Of late they came out even with a proposal on "unification tax" in a foolish bid to launch invasion of the north for unification to cope with the "contingency in the north." The above-said exercise was staged against this backdrop, pursuant to the "OPLAN 5029." This fact goes to prove the danger of that war exercise.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities go on with their provocations, pursuing the above-said wild ambition, instead of seeking reconciliation and cooperation with compatriots, it will be absolutely impossible to defuse the tension on the Korean Peninsula nor will it be possible to save the inter-Korean relations from a collapse.
					
					 Should the south Korean authorities persist in the confrontation with the north and moves for a war of aggression against it, swimming against the trend of the times, the DPRK will resolutely counter them, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Koreans Called on to Remain True to "By Our Nation Itself"
articles.content:
Koreans Called on to Remain True to "By Our Nation Itself"
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The idea of "By our nation itself" serves as an unwavering faith and common idea of independent reunification of all the Koreans in the June 15 era of reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The embodiment of the idea of "By our nation itself" provides a sure guarantee for independent reunification and indicates a basic way for achieving national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The issue of Korea's reunification should be solved by the Koreans in the north and the south, its masters, by their own efforts free from any outside interference. This is the main spirit that runs through the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The Koreans made landmark successes unprecedented in the history of inter-Korean relations under the banner of "By our nation itself" in the June 15 era of reunification. This clearly testifies to the validity and vitality of the north-south joint declarations that paved a wide avenue for settling the issue of Korea's reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					  The idea of "By our nation itself" represents the idea of great national unity. The great national unity is the mainstay of Korea's reunification. 
					
					  Inexhaustible is the strength of the nation united close as one under the banner of the idea of "By our nation itself". This serves as a driving force strong enough to shatter any obstructive moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad and successfully push forward the cause of Korea's reunification.
					
					 Those forces are getting evermore undisguised in their moves to block the advance of the cause of national reunification but the Koreans remain unshakable in their faith and will to achieve it without fail guided by the idea of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: Thorough Probe into Truth behind Warship Called for
articles.content:
Thorough Probe into Truth behind Warship Called for
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- More than 40 civic and public organizations including the Democratic Labor Party, the Bar Association for Democratic Society and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea at a press conference on Sept. 14 urged the puppet authorities to clearly probe the truth behind the "Cheonan" case.
					 The political parties and organizations held that the final report on the case opened to the public by the Ministry of Defence only had more pages than the results of investigation announced earlier and failed to clear the core doubts expressed since those results were made public.
					
					 Such sleight of hand to make this fiction sound real can never dispel the doubts of the people, they said, calling for making inspection of state administration to probe the truth behind the case.
					
					 They claimed that it is required not only to conduct south-north joint investigation but invite other countries to participate in the investigation, if necessary with a view to producing a report without a shred of doubt.
					
					 They called upon all the people to pool efforts for the probe into the truth behind the case, judge those who are agitating a war under the pretext of this case and conduct a vigorous struggle to achieve the peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Koreans in America Term Report on "Cheonan" Unreasonable
articles.content:
Koreans in America Term Report on "Cheonan" Unreasonable
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Ri Sung Hon, professor of Physics at Virginia University in the United States, and Dr. Yang Phan Sok of Manitoba University in Canada on Sept. 14 termed the final report on the "Cheonan" case opened to the public by the puppet Ministry of Defense of south Korea unreasonable.
					 They held that the final report failed to clarify any scientific mistake committed as regards the warship case as it was a repetition of the assertions made by the joint investigation team earlier. 
					
					The final report repeated the wrong assertions made about the analysis of the adsorptive on the body of "Cheonan" ship and the controversial torpedo, in particular, they claimed, and continued:
					
					 The Ministry of Defense failed to produce clear evidence proving that the torpedo propeller belonged to the north.
					
					 In the final analysis, the final report is an imperfect one as it shunned the clarification of the main cause of the warship sinking and failed to dispel any doubt from a scientific point of view, they asserted.

articles.title: End to US Forces' Presence in S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
End to US Forces' Presence in S. Korea Demanded
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany issued a statement in demand of an end to the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea on Sept. 10.
					 The U.S. forces' presence in south Korea is a basic factor of having blocked the reunification of Korea and brought all sorts of misfortune and pain to the Korean people, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The recent deterioration of the inter-Korean relations is also attributable to the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea.
					
					 The Soviet army withdrew from the DPRK after its founding but the U.S. has still kept its forces in south Korea, seeking to perpetuate the division of Korea.
					
					 The withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea is a prerequisite to achieving freedom and independence for the whole of Korea.
					
					 We demand the U.S. pull its forces out of south Korea so as to provide the Korean people with environment necessary for achieving the reunification of the country by their own efforts free from the interference of foreign forces and defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Suk Praised
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Suk Praised
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released the 63rd issue of its bulletin carrying a photo of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, on the 61st anniversary of her demise.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Mrs. Kim Jong Suk's exploits for building country" stressed that she, revered by the Korean people as an anti-Japanese heroine, not only fought with arms in her hand to liberate Korea from the military occupation of the Japanese imperialists but also performed great feats in building a new country after the liberation.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea Kim Jong Suk found herself among the people of all strata to explain in a profound way President Kim Il Sung's line of building a new country and arouse them to the building of the country and led the officials of people's power bodies to work as servants faithful to the people, it noted.
					
					 Even the flag and emblem of the DPRK are marked with her feats, the bulletin said, adding that her exploits for the cause of nation building would remain long with socialist Korea which will prosper forever.

articles.title: DPRK Birthday Marked in Austria
articles.content:
DPRK Birthday Marked in Austria
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna issued a bulletin under the title of "On the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK" on Sept. 9, which carried a picture of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Stressing that the birth of the DPRK would have been unthinkable without the President, the bulletin in an article dealt with the exploits performed by him for the liberation of Korea and the foundation of the DPRK.
					
					 As the head of state Kim Il Sung devoted his whole life to the reunification of Korea and the cause of socialism, the article said, adding that his revolutionary exploits would remain forever.
					
					 It stressed that the DPRK has turned into an invincible bulwark which no formidable enemy dare provoke thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il and that it would surely emerge a powerful and prosperous country under his leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in pamphlet by the Novosibirsk Azarin Publishing House of Russia on Sept. 13.
					 The work, published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995), reviews the glorious history of the WPK that hewed out the new path for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It serves as an immortal great programme for party building and activities as it indicates the way for developing the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente chileno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente chileno
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 200o aniversario de la independencia de Chile, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Chile, Sebastian Pinera Echenique.
					En la misiva, el remitente manifesto su conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Chile continuaran ampliandose y desarrollandose en el futuro y deseo al destinatario mayores exitos en sus trabajos para la prosperidad del pais y el fomento del bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun envia mensaje a Alfredo Moreno Charme
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun envia mensaje a Alfredo Moreno Charme
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo chileno, Alfredo Moreno Charme, con motivo del bicentenario de la independencia de Chile.
					La misiva expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones entre ambos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran constantemente conforme al ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y desea al destinatario exitos en su trabajo responsable.

articles.title: CRPP condena intencion belica de banda titere surcoreana
articles.content:
CRPP condena intencion belica de banda titere surcoreana
 Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En relacion con que la camarilla titere del Sur de Corea mostro su imprudente intento de asestar el ataque preventivo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando del "cambio del rumbo de la politica militar sobre el Norte", el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio el dia 17 la siguiente respuesta a la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea:
					 En la recien "reunion de revision general de la seguridad estatal", los titeres surcoreanos tramaron conciliabulo referente a establecer como la "politica militar sobre el Norte" la llamada estrategia de disuasivo activo cuyo contenido es asestar el ataque preventivo cuando aparezcan indicio de lanzamiento de armas nucleares o misiles y sintoma de guerra por parte de alguien. 
					
					 Esto significa declarar el cambio de la "estrategia de defensa" por la de ofensiva. Por lo tanto, deviene una grave provocacion militar y aventurero acto belico contra la RPDC.
					
					 El presente complot demuestra fehacientemente que los belicistas titeres ya han perfeccionado la operacion de ataque preventivo a traves de los ejercicios militares y ahora entran en la etapa de fijarlo oficialmente como "estrategia militar sobre el Norte". 
					
					 Ahora los titeres surcoreanos estan enloquecidos por la confrontacion y la guerra sin hacer caso de la opinion publica interna y externa que desea el dialogo y el alivio de la tension.
					
					 Los ejercicios belicos que se desarrollan casi todos los dias en los mares Este y Oeste de Corea muestran que la banda de titeres surcoreanos es la canalla que no sabe otra cosa sino el enfrentamiento y la guerra.
					
					 Historicamente, los agresores provocaron la guerra con el ataque preventivo, pero, siempre ha sido tragico su fin. 
					
					 Si bien los titeres surcoreanos actuan estupidamente hablando del ataque preventivo contra alguien, no tendran otro resultado que la autodestruccion vergonzosa. 
					
					 Estamos preparados a cualquier tipo de ataque preventivo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la sancion y el bloqueo de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la sancion y el bloqueo de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos describe la sancion y el bloqueo como medidas "punitivas" que aplican sin querer a los "paises problematicos" para garantizar la "paz y la estabilidad", la "democracia" y los "derechos humanos" en el mundo. Pero, esto no pasa de ser un sofisma para ocultar su siniestra intencion de tomar la hegemonia mundial aislando y asfixiando a los paises progresistas en virtud de su politica de sancion y bloqueo.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 18 y continua:
					
					 El imperio usa la sancion y el bloqueo como medio principal para aplastar a los paises que no le agradan y como espacio para mantener y fortalecer su "posicion de guia" en el mundo capitalista.
					
					  La verdadera intencion del imperio es derrumbar el regimen social de otros paises y establecer en ellos el orden de dominacion al estilo estadounidense mediante la sancion y el bloqueo.
					
					  Estas medidas de "castigo" resultan un crimen muy peligroso que acompana la guerra.
					
					  Lo demuestra el caso de Iraq que fue ocupado por las tropas norteamericanas al cabo de ser sancionado por largo tiempo.
					
					  El imperio intenta satisfacer facilmente su ambicion dominacionista al aplicar el mismo metodo, que ha usado en Iraq, contra otros paises, en particular, contra la RPDC. 
					
					  Especificamente, quiere ocupar facilmente a la RPDC tras acorralarla y debilitarla a traves de la sancion y bloqueo que se recrudecen ahora cada dia mas.
					
					 Nadie puede asegurar que la sancion y el bloqueo contra la RPDC no daran lugar a la guerra.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia el ejercicio de "estabilizacion del Norte"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia el ejercicio de "estabilizacion del Norte"
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El circulo militar titere del Sur de Corea libro en agosto junto con Estados Unidos el ejercicio para la "estabilizacion del Norte (de Corea)", que significa la siniestra provocacion politico-militar que niega el digno sistema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y la clara manifestacion de la persistente ambicion de agredirla.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este sabado y continua:
					
					Lo mas grave del caso esta en que el titere Ministerio de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea ha participado directamente en ese ejercicio. Esto demuestra que las autoridades conservadoras del Sur de Corea abrigan la intencion criminal de atacar con EE.UU. a la RPDC por via militar sonando con el supuesto "estado de emergencia del Norte", lejos de la reconciliacion entre el Norte y el Sur y la paz del pais.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas elaboraron ya los guiones de enfrentamiento de sistemas de distintos nombres como el "plan de gobernacion emergente" y hasta la llamada "constitucion de reunificacion" cuyo nucleo es la "reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal". Recientemente, propusieron el llamado "impuesto de reunificacion" haciendose la ilusion de la reunificacion mediante la agresion al Norte que quieren lanzar aprovechando el imaginario "estado de emergencia de esta parte". Bajo estas circunstancias, se ha librado el ejercicio para la "estabilizacion del Norte" segun el "plan operacional 5029", lo cual pone de relieve su caracter peligroso.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas continuan con sus acciones provocativas persiguiendo solo la ambicion de agredir al Norte en lugar de la reconciliacion y la cooperacion con los connacionales, la tension de la Peninsula Coreana no sera aliviada jamas y las relaciones intercoreanas tampoco saldran de la actual coyuntura catastrofica.
					
					Si ellas siguen recurriendo a la confrontacion fratricida entre ambas partes coreanas y a la campana belica contra la RPDC en desafio a la corriente de la epoca, el ejercito y el pueblo de esta les responderan rotundamente.
